title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show DP recaps some of the headlines in sports from the weekend. Will Cleveland be without both Baker and Deshaun next season? Albert Breer checks in to share his expectations for the Deshaun Watson hearing tomorrow. And Angels beat writer Jeff Fletcher explains the backstory to the brawl between the Angels and Mariners yesterday. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
